act.title: Dialog Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attemp the activity)

item.pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào mǎi xiē shénme ne?

item.hanzi: 让我想想，家里还有几个蛋和一些鸡肉。
item.pinyin: Ràng wǒ xiǎngxiang, jiā lǐ háiyǒu jǐ gè dàn hé yīxiē jīròu.

item.hanzi: 那我们买几个番茄吧，做个番茄炒蛋怎么样？
item.pinyin: Nà wǒmen mǎi jǐ gè fānqié ba, zuò gè fānqié chǎo dàn zěnmeyàng?

item.hanzi: 好啊，我很喜欢吃番茄炒蛋。
item.pinyin: Hǎo a, wǒ hěn xǐhuān chī fānqié chǎo dàn

item.hanzi: 鸡肉就用来做宫爆鸡丁吧，我们去买点花生。
item.pinyin: Jīròu jiù yònglái zuò gōng bào jīdīng ba, wǒmen qù mǎi diǎn huāshēng.
Háiyǒu shénme yào mǎi de ma?
Méiyǒu le, wǒmen qù jiézhàng ba.
